text: An impeccably-dressed gentleman is standing before a great polished wooden door.
The majestic and ornate doors open to reveal a refined gray-clad young man and his servant.

title: The Earl
text: Ah, I see you've finally arrived.

title: Mysterious Maid
text: Sir, you must have your invitation with you, right?

title: â €
text: Lisotem runs through his pockets, as if to find something, and miraculously finds a letter that wasn't in existence prior.
The too-perfect Earl and his companion sidestep and face the banquet crowd, allowing Lisotem entry.
Lisotem scans the crowd. To his great surprise, he finds three familiar figures among the guests.
Cherminon. One of the grandmasters of a certain religious military order.
Lusin? The Goddess on the moon?
This woman standing alone in her corner vaguely emits a divine aura. She has a certain ressemblance with the Moon Church's goddess. Lisotem can't be sure of it, but his guesses are often accurate.
After all, himself, Cherminon and Pain can be considered demigods.
Another being in the hall attracts his attention. She may be dressed like a fairly ordinary local aristocrat, but Lisotem has a hunch that she will be much more than that.
Who do you decide to first interact with?
